What if a 🐇, who was so wily that it became a careerist, fought a 🐻 who was so bitter that it became a rival? #Careerist=#Rival
The 🐻 loved a good fight with a tough opponent. #Careerist=#Rival
🐇🆚🐻 (or: 🐇 fought 🐻) So at first, the wily 🐇 faced-off with the bitter 🐻 in a tense confrontation.
🐇😄😏👉🐻 (or: 🐇 condescended to 🐻) But the 🐇 spoke to the 🐻 with an air of superiority.
🐻😈🎭😇🐇😨 (or: 🐇 was tricked by 🐻) So the 🐻's trickery went unnoticed by the 🐇.
🐇🎓🤓🐻😌💬 (or: 🐇 learned from 🐻) Yet the 🐇 became a dedicated student of the 🐻.
🐻👺💬🐇😇☘🏠🔜😡🍂🏚 (or: 🐇 was corrupted by 🐻) But the 🐻 lured the 🐇 over to the dark side.
🐇🤔💬🆚🗨🤔🐻 (or: 🐇 disagreed with 🐻) Yet the 🐇 expressed strong disagreement with the 🐻.
🐇➡🐻💀🔚🚔🔗 (or: 🐇 was arrested for killing 🐻) Then the 🐇 was arrested for brutally attacking the 🐻.
🐇🙏😭4⃣🐻 (or: 🐇 mourned for 🐻) But the 🐇 mourned for the loss of the 🐻.
🐇😱🐻👻 (or: 🐇 was haunted by 🐻) So in the end the bitter 🐻 came back to haunt the wily 🐇.
Have you tried to banish a ghost like the 🐻? It's harder than it looks. The End
Commandment XIII: Searchers, thou shalt NOT conduct searches for tight-fisted complainers. #ThingsMosesNeverSaid
A predatory eagle once planned an invasion. A vicious cow then thought "A marauder like me needs an invader like this for my invasions."
"The best invaders are overconfident invaders," thought the vicious cow So the cow decided to perform the invasion of the predatory eagle

What if a 🐿, who was so aristocratic that it became a duke, subjugated a 🐹 who was so lowly that it became a serf? #Duke=#Serf
The 🐿 would tolerate no dissent from anyone. 🐿🤐👐🐹 (or: 🐿 subjugated 🐹) So at first, the aristocratic 🐿 made the lowly 🐹 its bitch.
🐿💬🐹💂💯 (or: 🐿 was obeyed by 🐹) So the 🐹 pledged obedience to the 🐿.
🐿📢🤐🐹 (or: 🐿 ruled over 🐹) Then the 🐿 set the rules and the 🐹 obeyed them.
🐿😨👐🕹🐹🆓 (or: 🐿 lost control over 🐹) But the 🐿 could no longer call the 🐹's tune.
🐹😐😤😐😤🖐🆓🐿 (or: 🐿 was resisted by 🐹) So the 🐹 showed only defiance to the 🐿.
🐹➡🐿😡 (or: 🐹 angered 🐿) But the 🐹 made the 🐿 go red with anger. 🐿1⃣🆚0⃣🐹 (or: 🐿 defeated 🐹) Then the 🐿 defeated the 🐹 utterly.
🐿💐😅🐹 (or: 🐹 curried favor with 🐿) But the 🐹 assiduously curried favor with the 🐿.
🐹😈💰👉🐿🐵🔀🙈🙉 (or: 🐿 was bought off by 🐹) In the end, the lowly 🐹 bribed the aristocratic 🐿 to play along.
Thereafter the 🐿's soul belonged entirely to the 🐹 and it would never again belong to its rightful owner. The End
